edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.bullet

Class PlayerLaunchedBullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.bullet.Bullet
      • edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.bullet.PlayerLaunchedBullet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShrinkingPlayerLaunchedBullet

    public class PlayerLaunchedBullet
extends Bullet
    A Bullet shot by the player, which can deal damage to enemies.
    Author:
    bowenzhi

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerLaunchedBullet

        public PlayerLaunchedBullet(float velocity,
                    java.awt.Dimension hitbox,
                    com.sun.opengl.util.texture.Texture sprite,
                    java.awt.Dimension spriteSize,
                    int damage,
                    boolean lockAngle,
                    boolean offScreenDelete)
        Instantiates the bullet.
        Parameters:
        velocity - speed of bullet
        acceleration - acceleration of bullet
        airFric - air friction of bullet
        hitbox - hitbox of bullet
        sprite - sprite of bullet
        spriteSize - size of bullet
        damage - damage the bullet deals to enemies
        lockAngle - determines whether or not to calculate the angle the bullet is moving in for sprite animations
        offScreenDelete - whether not not to remove the bullet once offscreen

      • PlayerLaunchedBullet

        velocity - speed of bullet
        acceleration - acceleration of bullet
        airFric - air friction of bullet
        shape - shape of bullet
        c - color of bullet
        damage - damage the bullet deals to enemies
        lockAngle - determines whether or not to calculate the angle the bullet is moving in for sprite animations
        offScreenDelete - whether not not to remove the bullet once offscreen

        airFric - air friction of bullet
        hitbox - hitbox of bullet
        sprite - sprite of bullet
        spriteSize - size of bullet
        damage - damage the bullet deals to enemies
        lockAngle - determines whether or not to calculate the angle the bullet is moving in for sprite animations
        offScreenDelete - whether not not to remove the bullet once offscreen
        spinning - whether or not to attach an angular velocity to this bullet
